module Parcial2.Tikz.DrawCrossover where

import Parcial2.Labyrinth
import Parcial2.Tikz

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


tikzCromosome :: [TikzAttr] -> [Point2D] -> [Bool] -> TikzExpr
tikzCromosome _ genes conns | length genes /= length conns + 1 = error $ "wrong list sizes in"
                                                                      ++ " `tikzCromosome`"
tikzCromosome attrs genes conns = tikzScope [ "start chain=1 going right"
                                            , "node distance=-0.15mm"
                                            ]
                                $ do let conns' = map Just conns ++ [Nothing]
                                     (g, mbConn) <- genes `zip` conns'
                                     let gene = tikzNode ("on chain=1":attrs)
                                                         (show g)
                                                         Nothing
                                                         (show g)
                                     let conn = case mbConn of
                                            Just b -> tikzNode [] ('c':show g) Nothing
                                                               (if b then "+" else "-")
                                            _      -> TikzExpr []
                                     [gene, conn]
